name: Chris Tedesco, B.A.  Pharm.D
resume_snippet: Chris Tedesco, B.A.  Pharm.D PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:	 Over 25 years of clinical operations and patient recruitment experience including clinical trial management, monitoring, and auditing experience; from study start-up through close-out, across all phases of development (I – IV), various therapeutic areas, and patient populations (critical care, pediatric, geriatric, etc).  Experience consulting for large pharma, small pharma, and biotech companies (Pfizer, Wyeth, GSK, Genzyme, Ortho McNeill, etc
source_file: Active Associates/Tedesco, Chris/Tedesco, Chris AVS  CV 082125.docx
